metadata.name: Flow Type
metadata.description: DAC/CRS distinction between ODA (official development assistance) and other types of resource flow.

data.name: Non-export credit OOF
data.description: Other Official Flows, excl. export credits

data.name: Officially supported export credits
data.description: Officially supported export credits. Covers both official direct export credits and private export credits under official guarantee or insurance

data.name: Private Development Finance
data.description: Financing by civil society organisations (NGOs, philantropic foundations, etc.)

data.name: Private Market
data.description: Private long-term (i.e. over one-year maturity) capital transactions made by residents of DAC countries

data.name: Other Private flows at market terms
data.description: Private long-term (i.e. over one-year maturity) capital transactions made by residents of DAC countries

data.name: Other flows
data.description: e.g. non-ODA component of peacebuilding operations
